verses.verse: (A Psalm of David, when he fled from Absalom his son.) O <S%H3068>Lord,<s%> <S%H4100>how<s%> my <S%H6862>adversaries<s%> have <S%H7231>increased!<s%> <S%H7227>Many<s%> are <S%H6965>rising<s%> up <S%H5921>against<s%> me.
<S%H7227>Many<s%> are <S%H559>saying<s%> of my <S%H5315>soul,<s%> <S%H369>"There<s%> is <S%H369>no<s%> <S%H3444>deliverance<s%> for him in <S%H430>God.<s%>" <S%H5542>Selah.<s%>
But Thou, O <S%H3068>Lord,<s%> art a <S%H4043>shield<s%> <S%H1157>about<s%> me, My <S%H9202>glory,<s%> and the One who <S%H7311>lifts<s%> my <S%H7218>head.<s%>
I was <S%H7121>crying<s%> to the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> with my <S%H6963>voice,<s%> And He <S%H6030>answered<s%> me from His <S%H6944>holy<s%> <S%H2022>mountain.<s%> <S%H5542>Selah.<s%>
I <S%H7901>lay<s%> <S%H7901>down<s%> and <S%H3462>slept;<s%> I <S%H9516>awoke,<s%> for the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> <S%H5564>sustains<s%> me.

I will not be <S%H3372>afraid<s%> of <S%H7233>ten<s%> <S%H7233>thousands<s%> of <S%H5971>people<s%> <S%H834>Who<s%> have <S%H7896>set<s%> themselves <S%H5921>against<s%> me <S%H5439>round<s%> <S%H5439>about.<s%>

<S%H6965>Arise,<s%> O <S%H3068>Lord;<s%> <S%H3467>save<s%> me, O my <S%H430>God!<s%> For Thou hast <S%H5221>smitten<s%> <S%H3605>all<s%> my <S%H340>enemies<s%> on the <S%H3895>cheek;<s%> Thou hast <S%H7665>shattered<s%> the <S%H8127>teeth<s%> of the <S%H7563>wicked.<s%>
<S%H3444>Salvation<s%> belongs to the <S%H3068>Lord;<s%> Thy <S%H1293>blessing<s%> [be] upon Thy <S%H5971>people!<s%> <S%H5542>Selah.<s%>
